name: Antonio Castelo
description: Antonio Castelo AKA Mr. Fattie AKA Odamae Brown, is the conductor of the show and one of the owners. He also works as a side host at Todo es Mentira, a Spanish TV Show aired on Cuatro.

name: Miguel Campos
description: Miguel Campos AKA The other one is one of the owners of the project. He is responsible of the sections Roast to the people and Pena mora, two sections based on the viewers' participation. He also works as a script coordinator at La Resistencia, a famous spanish late night.

name: Iggy Rubín
description: Iggy Rubin es el empollón de comedia del programa. Es responsable de las secciones Thank you for this beautiful comedy y Gira de festivales.

name: Jorge Yorya
description: Jorge Yorya es un elemento clave en el programa. Hace, básicamente, lo que le apetece en My name is Giovani Giorgio, but everybody calls me Yorya de unas formas un poco rarunas. Es como un accidente de coche, no es agradable de ver pero no puedes dejar de mirarlo. #Yoryer
